PeerBin.description:
Peer binary representation.
First 4 bytes are IP address, last 2 bytes are port.
Network byte order (big endian).
Used when `compact=1` in announce url or if no `compact` is present.
See: <http://bittorrent.org/beps/bep_0023.html>

RegisterDTO.description:
Data transfer object (DTO) used for registering.
This object is serialized and transfered from the frontend to the backend to register a new user.
